value: A parameterizable consensus brain graph, derived from connectomes of 477 people, each computed from MRI datasets of the Human Connectome Project. Nodes are brain regions, and edges are weighted by the number of \tracks\" that run between two nodes
column4: fractional anisotropy and the number of occurrences in each of the 477 individuals."
